channel.title: CVE Feed for NetSclaer -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-5492|2024-07-12T20:15:15.431Z -- netsclaer -- netscaler%20adc
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to redirect users to arbitrary websites in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway

item.title: CVE-2024-6236|2024-07-10T20:18:04.274Z -- netsclaer -- netscaler%20console
item.description: Denial of Service in NetScaler Console (formerly NetScaler ADM), NetScaler Agent, and NetScaler SDX
